Question 6
                                  
 
 
A shell and tube heat exchange is used as a steam condenser. Coolant water inters the tube at 300 K and 
at a rate of 100 kg/s. The overall heat transfer coefficient is 1500 
2
W/m K
  and total heat transfer area is
2
400 m
 . Steam condenses at a saturation temperature of 350 K. Assume that the specific heat of coolant 
water is 4000 J/kgK. The temperature of the coolant water coming out of the condenser is _______ K 
(round off to the nearest integer).
Heat Transfer (Heat Exchanger) 
 
Ans. 
338.8434
